channel.title: Why does it only ++ once?

item.title: Why does it only ++ once?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Test after testâ€¦

case 1281: if(playerLevel[8] > 14) if(playerHasItem(1351) || (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1351)) { setAnimation(879); addItem(1521, 1); addSkillXP(2000, 8); sendMessage("You get some oak logs."); treetimer ++; } else { sendMessage("You need an axe to cut this tree!"); } else { if(playerLevel[8] < 15) sendMessage("You need 15 woodcutting to cut oaks."); } if (treetimer == 5) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 1342, 0, 10); } break;
In the original part of the case, how come treetimer only ++ once?
I have tested it many times, and it does not go past 1.

Read full topic
